FieldDefinition.description: Mean goal for all records that fit the condition
FieldDefinition.name: averageGoal

FieldDefinition.description: Maximum bin value of the field selected for the condition (applies to Continuous fields)
FieldDefinition.name: binMaximum

FieldDefinition.description: Minimum bin value of the field selected for the condition (applies to Continuous fields)
FieldDefinition.name: binMinimum

FieldDefinition.description: Number of records that fit the condition
FieldDefinition.name: populationCount

FieldDefinition.description: Percent of total population that fits the condition
FieldDefinition.name: populationPercentage

FieldDefinition.description: Distance between the mean goals of the condition's population and the total population (in standard deviations)
FieldDefinition.name: stdDevFromMean

FieldDefinition.description: Value of the field selected for the condition (applies to Categorical, Ordinal, and Boolean fields)
FieldDefinition.name: value

FieldDefinition.description: Measure evaluating the strength of the condition
FieldDefinition.name: zScore
